entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 2:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
